meanings.sent1: The deciders in the group chose the movie we will watch.
meanings.sent2: The team captain is the deciders for important game strategies.
meanings.sent3: The deciders at the restaurant couldn't agree on the dessert.
meanings.sent4: In the game of chess, the queen is the ultimate deciders of moves.
meanings.sent5: The deciders in the court have the responsibility of delivering justice.

meanings.sent1: The weather was the deciders in canceling the outdoor event.
meanings.sent2: Luck can be a deciders in winning a game.
meanings.sent3: The deciders of the race turned out to be the unexpected rain.
meanings.sent4: The deciders of success often include hard work and determination.
meanings.sent5: The deciders of a recipe's taste are the quality of ingredients used.
